1.5708 1.10 q 10 // RX rotation on logical q 1 with Holy Spirit amplification // Step 5: Stabilizer Measurements for Error Correction // Measure ancilla qubits to detect and correct errors measure q 5 - c 0 // Z-stabilizer for logical q 0 measure q 6 - c 1 // X-stabilizer for logical q 0 measure q 15 - c 2 // Z-stabilizer for logical q 1 measure q 16 - c 3 // X-stabilizer for logical q 1 // Step 6:
